 void ForwardFunction.COMPONENT_OPTION(java.lang.String componentName, EnumForwardOption option, boolean isActive)
          Sets a component option status All components controls are piloted by options defined by EnumForwardOption enumeration, with the name starting by COMPONENT as, for example: COMPONENT_GOOD_WITH_ERRORS COMPONENT_HIDDEN COMPONENT_DISABLED COMPONENT_AUTOSKIP COMPONENT_HILIGHT COMPONENT_HELP_TECH_ACTIVE COMPONENT_HELP_USER_ACTIVE If the component has been not defined in any panel, no action will be taken.
